Sentencas: The optimization of technology for manufacturing bilayered anode supports for planar solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) using precursors was performed.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The bilayered anode supports for the second-generation planar SOFCs were manufactured by the tape casting method followed by the lamination.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: Nickel sulfate heptahydrate NiSO4 center dot 7H(2)O was used to fabricate the composite material for the current-collecting layer containing 60 vol % NiO and the functional layer containing 40 vol % NiO (the chosen values are close to the first and second percolation thresholds).
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The 8YSZ/NiSO4 composite mixture was calcined at a temperature of 1000 degrees C.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The use of this precursor resulted in fabricating durable anode support that retains mechanical stability during redox cycling.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: Finely dispersed NiO in a thin functional layer led to a high density of three-phase boundaries, which had a beneficial effect on the electrochemical activity of the anode.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: Based on these anode supports, the model samples of solid oxide fuel cells were manufactured.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The samples were studied using conventional electrochemical techniques.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs

Sentencas: The power density was 1 W/cm(2) at an operating temperature of 750 degrees C.
Titulo: Application of Yttria Stabilized Zirconia (8YSZ) and NiO Precursors for Fabrication of Composite Material for Anode-Supported SOFCs
